schema.name: addressBook_setAddress
schema.description: Set an alias name for an ethereum address and store it in the address book.

name.description: The name of the contact, Ex: Alice, Bob, etc.

addressOrEns.description: The ethereum address or ENS of the contact, Ex: 0x1f9090aaE28b8a3dCeaDf281B0F12828e676c326, alice.eth
